'''Remnants of the Secret Source''' is a [[Quest Domain]] for {{Quest|Echoes of Life}}.

==Walkthrough==
# Follow the road
# Use the [[Yumkasaurus]] Spiritsconce to continue via the [[Coilgrass Sigil]]s
#* There is a '''Common Chest''' on the way.
# Defeat the enemies{{Enemy List|Koholasaurus*2/abyss version;Yumkasaurus*2/abyss version}}
#* A '''Common Chest''' appears after the fight.
# Use the [[Koholasaurus]] Spiritsconce to continue via the [[Spiritway]]
# Defeat the enemies
#* Wave 1:{{Enemy List|Hilichurl*3}}
#* Wave 2:{{Enemy List|Pyro Abyss Mage;Tepetlisaurus*2/abyss version}}
# Activate the mechanism to open the door
# Use the [[Tepetlisaurus]] Spiritsconce to continue via the [[Molten Fissure]]
# Defeat the enemies
#* Wave 1:{{Enemy List|Crackling Axe Mitachurl*2;Electro Samachurl}}
#* Wave 2:{{Enemy List|Hilichurl Grenadier*2;Stonehide Lawachurl}}
#* An '''Exquisite Chest''' appears after the fight.
# Activate the mechanism to open the door
# Use the [[Tepetlisaurus]] Spiritsconce to destroy the rock wall and climb the solid [[Phlogiston]] wall
# Enter the [[Night Kingdom]]

==Chests==
See Walkthrough above for the locations.
*[[Common Chest]]s ×2
*[[Exquisite Chest]] ×1
